officialTitle: The Effect of Body Mass Index, Intra-abdominal Pressure, Abdominal Girth and Waist Circumference on Sensory Block Level After Single-shot Spinal Anesthesia for Cesarean Section
inclusionCriteria:
* adult female partner
* aged 18 to 40 years.
* scheduled for elective cesarean section.
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Patients with coagulopathy or under anti-coagulation therapy.
* Gastrointestinal disease,
* motion sickness.
* diabetes mellitus.
* Patients with preeclampsia,
